title: Ticket #3256: Implement Negotiator-Schedd protocol extension for global jobprios
description:
As a development milestone in support of honoring job priorities across multiple schedds, modify the Schedd to honor a protocol extension. The Negotiator-Schedd protocol will be extended to include a request for "only jobs from user X and with job priorities between Y and Z inclusive" (as opposed to the current "only jobs from user X"). To ensure backwards/forwards wire compatibility, this is accomplished via two new attributes (JOBPRIO_MIN and JOBPRIO_MAX) in the classad exchanged between the negotiator and schedd at the start of negotiation.

See the parent ticket for the design document and further details.
remarks:
